#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define sz 1000009
#define mod 1000000007
using namespace std;

long long fac[sz];
long long arr[sz];

void init() {
  fac[0] = 1;
  arr[0] = 1;
  for(int i=1;i<sz;i++) {
    fac[i] = fac[i-1]*i;
    fac[i] %= mod;
    arr[i] = arr[i-1]+fac[i];
    arr[i] %= mod;
  }
}

int main() {
  init();
  int t;
  cin>>t;
  while(t--) {
    int a, b;
    scanf("%d%d", &a, &b);
    printf("%lld\n", (arr[b]-arr[a-1]+mod)%mod);
  }
  return 0;
}
